newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Brussels bourse at new closing high.
newsitem.headline: Brussels bourse at new closing high.

text.p: 1435 GMT - Bel-20 index ended Wednesday at a new closing high as a late wave of buying lifted the index by five points in the last minute of business.
* Bel-20 closed 10.53 points or 0.47 percent higher at 2,245.51, but off an earlier intraday high of 2,249.85. The day's range was 2,249.85/2,236.38. There were 15 gainers and five losers.
* Main index gainer was Union Miniere, up 2.7 percent at 2,905 francs, followed by insurer Royale Belge, up 2.1 percent at 9,200 francs, and PetroFina, up 1.8 percent at 12,725 francs
